arguments.query: Donald Trump recent bills passed in last 6 months 2025

results.title: US Senate passes Trump's sweeping tax-cut and spending bill, setting up House battle | Reuters
results.snippet: The legislation now heads to the House for possible final approval, though a handful of Republicans there have already voiced opposition.

results.title: Here's what's in the big bill that just passed the Senate
results.snippet: The bill would provide some $350 billion for Trump’s border and national security agenda, including $46 billion for the U.S.-Mexico border wall and $45 billion for 100,000 migrant detention facility beds, as he aims to fulfill his promise of the largest mass deportation operation in U.S.

results.title: July 1, 2025 - Senate passes Trump’s agenda bill after marathon voting session | CNN Politics
results.snippet: The Senate passed President Donald Trump’s sweeping domestic policy bill after an overnight marathon voting session.

results.title: Trump's 'Big, Beautiful Bill' PASSES despite Republican rebels... here are the crucial tax cuts YOU need to know about | Daily Mail Online
results.snippet: Congress has passed President Donald Trump's 'Big, Beautiful Bill,' a landmark piece of tax cuts and spending legislation containing many of the Republican's campaign promises.

results.title: House GOP averts rebellion to push Trump’s bill to final stage in Congress | Fox News
results.snippet: Congress has advanced President Donald Trump's vast tax and immigration bill, called the 'big, beautiful bill,' with the goal of passing it by the Fourth of July.

results.title: House passes Trump's signature bill, sending it to the president's desk
results.snippet: House Republicans passed President Donald Trump’s signature bill, bringing $4.5 trillion in tax breaks and spending cuts, money for deportations and Medicaid cuts.
